verb.description: Make (a function) a permanent feature in a computer by means of permanently connected circuits, so that it cannot be altered by software.
examples: the rate at which the supply of bitcoins grows is hardwired into the system
hardwired microprocessors only execute code; they themselves are not programmable

verb.description: Make (a pattern of behavior or belief) standard or instinctive.
examples: it takes about three weeks for a new habit to be hardwired in your brain
